doc.repnme: Transcript of meeting of the Executive Directors of the IBRD, held on Tuesday, April 29, 1969 : Tanzania - Second Education Project
doc.abstracts: This partial transcript, from the session of the Executive Directors of the International Bank on Reconstruction and Development held on Tuesday, April 29, 1969, covers only the discussion on the Second Education Project for Tanzania.
